recorderSession.description: Test initialization and access to an inherited control declared with default (package) access via protected/public methods in the super class page flow.

header.name: user-agent
header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.0.4) Gecko/20060508 Firefox/1.5.0.4

response.responseBody:
Inherited Control Test

This test will call an inherited page flow method that calls a method on a control declared with default (package) access in the parent page flow Controller. The test will call the inherited method to access/use the control in page flow onCreate, the Action, and during JSP rendering.

The table below contains an echo'd message from the control in the parent page flow Controller. Each line represents calling the control at various stages of the page flow life cycle for rendering a page.

onCreate message'Echo: 'bugs.j1060.derived.Controller - Inside the Controller onCreate()''
action message'Echo: 'bugs.j1060.derived.Controller - Inside the Controller action begin.do''
property access message'Echo: 'bugs.j1060.derived.Controller - Inside the property accessor''

another action

This test will call an inherited page flow method that calls a method on a control declared with default (package) access in the parent page flow Controller. The test will call the inherited method to access/use the control in page flow onCreate, the Action, and during JSP rendering.
